title: [Dynamic Regions]: the statistics of region buckets can't work well for coprocessor request
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
master
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
amd
### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
run sysbench table scan 
### What did you expect?
the statistics of region buckets work well
### What did happened?
the statistics of region buckets  is zero
